trans-unit.source: Troubleshooting: 'Active Directory' item is missing or not available | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Troubleshooting: 'Active Directory' item is missing or not available | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: What to do when Active Directory menu item doesn't appear in the Azure Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: What to do when Active Directory menu item doesn't appear in the Azure Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: Troubleshooting: 'Active Directory' item is missing or not available
trans-unit.target: Troubleshooting: 'Active Directory' item is missing or not available

trans-unit.source: Many of the instructions for using Azure Active Directory features and services begin with "Go to the Azure Management Portal and click **Active Directory**."
trans-unit.target: Many of the instructions for using Azure Active Directory features and services begin with "Go to the Azure Management Portal and click **Active Directory**."

trans-unit.source: But what do you do if the Active Directory extension or menu item does not appear or if it is marked **Not Available**?
trans-unit.target: But what do you do if the Active Directory extension or menu item does not appear or if it is marked **Not Available**?

trans-unit.source: This topic is designed to help.
trans-unit.target: This topic is designed to help.

trans-unit.source: It describes the conditions under which **Active Directory** does not appear or is unavailable and explains how to proceed.
trans-unit.target: It describes the conditions under which **Active Directory** does not appear or is unavailable and explains how to proceed.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory is missing
trans-unit.target: Active Directory is missing

trans-unit.source: Typically, an **Active Directory** item appears in the left navigation menu.
trans-unit.target: Typically, an **Active Directory** item appears in the left navigation menu.

trans-unit.source: The instructions in Azure Active Directory procedures assume that this item is in your view.
trans-unit.target: The instructions in Azure Active Directory procedures assume that this item is in your view.

trans-unit.source: Screen shot: Active Directory in Azure
trans-unit.target: Screen shot: Active Directory in Azure

trans-unit.source: The Active Directory item appears in the left navigation menu when any of the following conditions is true.
trans-unit.target: The Active Directory item appears in the left navigation menu when any of the following conditions is true.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the item does not appear.
trans-unit.target: Otherwise, the item does not appear.

trans-unit.source: The current user signed on with a Microsoft account (formerly known as a Windows Live ID).
trans-unit.target: The current user signed on with a Microsoft account (formerly known as a Windows Live ID).

trans-unit.source: OR
trans-unit.target: OR

trans-unit.source: The Azure tenant has a directory and the current account is a directory administrator.
trans-unit.target: The Azure tenant has a directory and the current account is a directory administrator.

trans-unit.source: OR
trans-unit.target: OR

trans-unit.source: The Azure tenant has at least one Azure AD Access Control (ACS) namespace.
trans-unit.target: The Azure tenant has at least one Azure AD Access Control (ACS) namespace.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Access Control Namespace](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/gg185908.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Access Control Namespace](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/gg185908.aspx).

trans-unit.source: OR
trans-unit.target: OR

trans-unit.source: The Azure tenant has at least one Azure Multi-Factor Authentication provider.
trans-unit.target: The Azure tenant has at least one Azure Multi-Factor Authentication provider.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Administering Azure Multi-Factor Authentication Providers](multi-factor-authentication-get-started-cloud.md/creating-an-azure-multi-factor-auth-provider).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Administering Azure Multi-Factor Authentication Providers](multi-factor-authentication-get-started-cloud.md/creating-an-azure-multi-factor-auth-provider).

trans-unit.source: To create an Access Control namespace or a Multi-Factor Authentication provider, click **+New** > **App Services** > **Active Directory**.
trans-unit.target: To create an Access Control namespace or a Multi-Factor Authentication provider, click **+New** > **App Services** > **Active Directory**.

trans-unit.source: To get administrative rights to a directory, have an administrator assign an administrator role to your account.
trans-unit.target: To get administrative rights to a directory, have an administrator assign an administrator role to your account.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Assigning administrator roles](active-directory-assign-admin-roles.md).
trans-unit.target: For details, see [Assigning administrator roles](active-directory-assign-admin-roles.md).

trans-unit.source: Active Directory is not available
trans-unit.target: Active Directory is not available

trans-unit.source: When you click **+New** > **App Services**, an **Active Directory** item appears.
trans-unit.target: When you click **+New** > **App Services**, an **Active Directory** item appears.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the Active Directory item appears when any of the Active Directory features, such as Directory, Access Control, or Multi-Factor Auth Provider, are available to the current user.
trans-unit.target: Specifically, the Active Directory item appears when any of the Active Directory features, such as Directory, Access Control, or Multi-Factor Auth Provider, are available to the current user.

trans-unit.source: However, while the page is loading, the item is dimmed and is marked **Not Available**.
trans-unit.target: However, while the page is loading, the item is dimmed and is marked **Not Available**.

trans-unit.source: This is a temporary state.
trans-unit.target: This is a temporary state.

trans-unit.source: If you wait a few seconds, the item becomes available.
trans-unit.target: If you wait a few seconds, the item becomes available.

trans-unit.source: If the delay is prolonged, refreshing the web page often resolves the problem.
trans-unit.target: If the delay is prolonged, refreshing the web page often resolves the problem.

trans-unit.source: Screen shot: Active Directory is not available
trans-unit.target: Screen shot: Active Directory is not available

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
